reviews.review: okay guys this game is great! can be played for hours! and its a game where its okay to use hundreds of dollars on skins!! just dont hack then youll end up on a second account and then youll lose those hundreds of dollars (im talking through experience) dont hack okay? its fun for you but no one else okay? all you do is get banned and lose money okay? good xD i know this is a bad review but for god sake this game is freaking amazing!! its so popular even me freaking grandma knows what it is so its a good and popular game! buy and play it scrubs xD

- After 1800 hours, from playing the game super seriously, and competitively, to playing the game more for fun, not really caring about my rank. I found the game more fun playing it casually with friends. 
 - Despite what most other reviews will probably say, I haven't encountered many cheaters since the implementation of Trust Factors, in fact I could probably count the number of cheaters I have encountered on one hand.
 
 Overall, fun game, 7.8/8 would recommend to a friend.

Counter-Strike is a game fueled and established by its community. Not only did it rise from being a mere Half-Life mod, to being one of the most played games in history, but it's community is still thriving. Whether you're hyper-competitive, or more casual, between Valve services and community servers there's always something fun you can do. You can strive to be one of the best, as the skill ceiling is incredibly high -- where movement, teamwork, aim, and other skills all apply. Or you could choose to just have fun and look good, the aesthetic updates have really bolstered the fashionable and collector sides of the community. Not interested in that? Look to the community servers! There are other gamemodes like Surf, bhop, Zombie run, and others that provide an entirely different aspect of gameplay altogether. Since the game has become free now, I recommend that you at the very least give it a look, as it's not just another corporate sequel, but a game built and designed around the community that made it happen in the first place.

In my opinion this is a very good game. While there is quite a large part of the community that is toxic most of the players are really kind and helpful. The game works well in terms of balancing games out and makes sure new players can learn how to work stuff around it. There is a lot of space for training and practise before you get into ranked. Overall really good and fun game.
